resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h4. Feature Description
The customer wants to be able to hide a navigation bar as can do it in android or ios. 

Right now, they are using this:

http://docs.appcelerator.com/titanium/2.0/index.html#!/api/Titanium.UI.MobileWeb.NavigationGroup

comments.body: .hide() works just find according to my testing (it hides the entire navigation group, not just the bar). Did you mean some other method/property? Android doesn't have a navigation group.
